CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-1-TEXT: Normal damage and target vanishes, reappearing 1d4 rounds later
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-3-TEXT: Double damage and target randomly loses one spell or one use of a spell-like ability
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-4-TEXT: Normal damage and normal damage of a random energy type
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-5-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-6-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-FRIGHTENED=frightened% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-7-TEXT: Normal damage and dispel magic on the target
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-9-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-10-TEXT: Normal damage and target is charmed for 3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-11-TEXT: Double damage. If electricity spell, target %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-12-TEXT: Double damage and you may give the target 1 suggestion (as the spell. %SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-13-TEXT: Double damage. If cold spell, target takes 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-14-TEXT: Double damage and you become %STATUS-INVISIBLE=invisible% for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-15-TEXT: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-16-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-17-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to animals, fey, magical beasts, and vermin
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-18-TEXT: Normal damage and target is petrified for 1d4 hours (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-19-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DAZZLED=dazzled% for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-20-TEXT: Normal damage and target is slow for 1d6 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-21-TEXT: Double damage and 2d6 random energy damage (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Reflex half%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-22-TEXT: Normal damage and target sent to a random plane (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-23-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-24-TEXT: Double damage and ignore energy resistance (but not immunity)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-25-TEXT: Double damage and you and target switch places
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-26-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-27-TEXT: Double damage and target takes a -4 penalty on saves vs. your spells for 1d6 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-28-TEXT: Normal damage this round and half damage each round for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-29-TEXT: Double damage and 1d4 damage to a random ability score
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-30-TEXT: Double damage and target glows like faerie fire for 1d6 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-31-TEXT: Double damage. If fire spell, target catches fire, taking 2d6 fire damage per round until extinguished
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-32-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to aberrations and outsiders
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-33-TEXT: Double damage. If acid spell, target takes 2d6 acid damage for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-34-TEXT: Double damage and target spends 1 round laughing (as hideous laughter spell, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-35-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCORPOREAL=incorporeal% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-36-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 negative level (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Fort negates after 1 day%)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-37-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to giants, humanoids and monstrous humanoids
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-38-TEXT: Double damage and an illusion appears to attack foe, flanking him for you for 1d6 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-39-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-ENTANGLED=entangled% (DC 20 Str or Escape Artist to be freed)
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-40-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to dragons
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-41-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-42-TEXT: Normal damage. If elemental spell, Medium elemental appears to serve for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-43-TEXT: Normal damage and half damage to all adjacent targets
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-44-TEXT: Double damage and target loses scent and blindsense for 1 day
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-45-TEXT: Normal damage and target cannot cast spells or use spell-like abilities for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-46-TEXT: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-47-TEXT: Double damage and if the spell did elemental damage the target is now vulnerable to that element for 3 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-48-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 rounds
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-49-TEXT: Double damage and spell is not lost
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-51-TEXT: Normal damage. You are healed the same amount
CARD-CRITICAL-MAGIC-52-TEXT: Normal damage and target is reduced for 3 rounds (as Reduce person, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Will negates%)
